on reading compounds: 待遇【タイグウ】treatment, reception, service, working conditions, salary, pay, remuneration
待機【タイキ】standing by, awaiting an opportunity, being on alert
歓待【カンタイ】warm welcome, friendly reception, hospitality, entertainment
優待【ユウタイ】preferential treatment, hospitality, warm reception, welcome
kun reading compounds: 待つ【まつ】to wait, to await, to look forward to, to anticipate, to depend on, to need
待つ身は長い【まつみはながい】a watched pot never boils
